titleStmt.title: A shorte declaration of the lives and doctrinde [sic] of the Protestants and puritans vvher by one of independent iudgment may knovv the holinesse of their religion.
titleStmt.author: Griffin, George Augustus, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Prentet in the prnt [sic] hous of Marin Michel,

notesStmt.note: Sometimes misattributed to George Augustus Griffin.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the prnt [sic] hous of Marin Michel
